Flow.description: 06/06/2025: Added email alert to the end of the flow 17/03/2025: Set Record Type to Commercial

formulas.name: FULLDAYGRAB
formulas.expression: IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC4 - East England", 950, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC1 - South West England", 895, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC2 - Wales and Midlands", 875, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC3 - Northern England", 895, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC7 - South England", 895,0)))))

formulas.name: GRABLOAD
formulas.expression: IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC4 - East England", 330, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC1 - South West England", 340, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC2 - Wales and Midlands", 285, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC3 - Northern England", 285, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC7 - South England", 340,0)))))

formulas.name: HALFDAYGRAB
formulas.expression: IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC4 - East England", 575, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC1 - South West England", 520, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC2 - Wales and Midlands", 460, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC3 - Northern England", 510, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC7 - South England", 520,0)))))

formulas.name: HOURRATEGRAB
formulas.expression: IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC4 - East England", 330, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC1 - South West England", 340, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC2 - Wales and Midlands", 285, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC3 - Northern England", 285, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC7 - South England", 340,0)))))

formulas.name: MOTDELIVERY
formulas.expression: IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC4 - East England", 43, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC1 - South West England", 35, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC2 - Wales and Midlands", 35, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC3 - Northern England", 43, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC7 - South England", 35,0)))))

formulas.name: quoteName
formulas.expression: LEFT("OR Grab Request | PO Number: "&{!PO_Number}&" | Address: "&{!Address.street}&", " &{!Address.postalCode},255)

formulas.name: SalesNotes
formulas.expression:
"

" & "Requested By: " & {!$User.Full_Name__c} & "
" & "Delivery Postcode: " & {!Address.postalCode} & "
" & "PO Number: " & {!PO_Number} & "
" & "BCC Reference: " & {!BCC_Reference} & "
" & "Site Contact: " & {!First_Name} & " " & {!Last_Name} & " - " & {!Contact_Number.value} & " - " & {!ContactEmail.value} & "

" & "" & "" & "" & "" & "
Hire Period:" & {!Hire_Period} & "
Date Required From:" & CASE( WEEKDAY({!Hire_Start_Date}), 1, "Sunday ", 2, "Monday ", 3, "Tuesday ", 4, "Wednesday ", 5, "Thursday ", 6, "Friday ", 7, "Saturday ", "" ) & TEXT(DAY({!Hire_Start_Date})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!Hire_Start_Date})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!Hire_Start_Date})) & "
Date Required To:" & CASE( WEEKDAY({!Hire_End_Date}), 1, "Sunday ", 2, "Monday ", 3, "Tuesday ", 4, "Wednesday ", 5, "Thursday ", 6, "Friday ", 7, "Saturday ", "" ) & TEXT(DAY({!Hire_End_Date})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!Hire_End_Date})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!Hire_End_Date})) & "
" & "
" & "" & "" & "" & "" & "
Total Tonnes Muckaway:" & IF(ISBLANK({!TotalGrabLoads}), "Not Required", TEXT({!TotalGrabLoads})) & "
Sand Delivered:" & IF(ISBLANK({!Tonnes_of_Sand}), "Not Required", TEXT({!Tonnes_of_Sand})) & "
MOT Type 1 Delivered:" & IF(ISBLANK({!Tonnes_of_MOT_Type_1}), "Not Required", TEXT({!Tonnes_of_MOT_Type_1})) & "
" & "

" & "Job Notes: " & {!Job_Notes} & "
" & "

"

formulas.name: SANDDELIVERY
formulas.expression: IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC4 - East England", 43, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC1 - South West England", 35, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC2 - Wales and Midlands", 32, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC3 - Northern England", 43, IF({!BOC_Reference} = "BOC7 - South England", 35,0)))))

Flow.label: Openreach: RLS Connected Grab Form

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ConfirmationofProcessing
fields.fieldText: You do not have access to this resource.

fields.name: POAndAddressDetailsHeader
fields.fieldText: PO and Address Details:

fields.name: ConfirmationofProcessing
fields.fieldText:
Thank you, your order has been submitted and will be handled by our team.


﻿We will send you an email confirming the booking once processed.

defaultValue.stringValue: Please enter any specific notes here.

fields.name: ConfirmReqMatHEader
fields.fieldText: Please confirm the materials required, and quantity:

fields.name: GrabLeadsConfirmHEader
fields.fieldText: Please confirm the total number of tonnes to be removed:

validationRule.errorMessage: The hire start date cannot be before today's date.
